exec: // Check if the response status code is 201
// Save the patient ID to an environment variable

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -sS -X POST http://localhost:8080/fhir/Patient \
  -H "Content-Type: application/fhir+json" \
  -d '{
    "resourceType":"Patient",
    "name":[{"use":"official","family":"Doe","given":["Jane"]}],
    "gender":"female",
    "birthDate":"1988-05-21",
    "identifier":[{"system":"https://example.org/mrn","value":"MRN-0001"}],
    "address":[{"city":"Zurich","country":"CH"}]
  }'

exec: // Save the id from the response to a collection variable

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -sS -G http://localhost:8080/fhir/Questionnaire \
  -H 'Accept: application/fhir+json' \
  --data-urlencode 'url=urn:uuid:prem-v1' \
  --data-urlencode '_pretty=true'

item.name: Get all QR per Questionaire Url
Get QR id list By Questionnaire Url
Get QR Count per Questionnaire Url

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -sS 'http://localhost:8080/fhir/QuestionnaireResponse?_count=20&_sort=-_lastUpdated' \
  -H 'Accept: application/fhir+json' | jq '.total, .entry[]?.resource.id'
